code: import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from"react";import{Link,useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import InfoTooltip from"./InfoTooltip";import*as auth from"../utils/auth";import{FormValidator,formConfigAuth}from"../utils/formValidator";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{handleLogin}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[showModal,setShowModal]=useState(false);const[isSuccess,setIsSuccess]=useState(false);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const history=useHistory();const formRef=useRef();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();auth.authorize(email,password).then(()=>{handleLogin(email);history.push("/");resetValidation();}).catch(error=>{console.error("Login error:",error);setShowModal(true);setIsSuccess(false);setMessage("Ops, algo deu errado! Por favor, tente novamente.");});};const resetValidation=()=>{const formValidator=new FormValidator({formElement:formRef.current,config:formConfigAuth});formValidator.resetValidation();};const enableValidation=()=>{const formValidator=new FormValidator({formElement:formRef.current,config:formConfigAuth});formValidator.enableValidation();};useEffect(()=>{enableValidation();},[]);const closeModal=()=>{setShowModal(false);setIsSuccess(false);setMessage("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"login__welcome",children:"Entrar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"auth__form login__form",ref:formRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,id:"email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"E-mail",required:true,className:"auth__input login__input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"popup__error",id:"email-error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,id:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Senha",minLength:6,required:true,className:"auth__input login__input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"popup__error",id:"password-error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login__button-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"auth__button login__button",children:"Entrar"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"login__signin",children:["Ainda n\xE3o \xE9 membro?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"link",to:"/signup",children:"Inscreva-se aqui!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InfoTooltip,{isOpen:showModal,onClose:closeModal,isSuccess:isSuccess,message:message})]});};export default Login;
